name: 楊恆隆
objective:
1. 簡介 2. 視覺與色彩 3. 陰極射線管顯示器 4. 電漿顯示器 5. 液晶顯示器 6. 電致發光顯示器 7. 場發射顯示器 8. 有機發光顯示器

The goal of this course is to help students understaand the fundamental concepts of flat-panel displays (FPD's) including liquid-crystal displays (LCD), organic light-emitting diode (OLED), Basic LCD panel design, and In-plane Switching (IPS) wide viewing-angle technology.
schedule:
Weeks                       Subjects
===================================================
1,2,3                       FPD General
4,5,6                       LCD Wide-viewing angle: IPS technology
7,8,9                       Organic LED 
10,11,12,13, 14       Lectures from Industry
14,15                      AM-LCD Panel Design
16,17                      Solid-Light Interaction
18                           Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Term Paper x1: 40%
Computer Project x1: 40%
Final Exam :20%
materials:
References:
(1)”Optics of Liquid Crystal Display” by Pochi Yeh & Claire Gu
(2)”Organic Light-Emissive Devices: a Survey” by Joseph Shiner
(3)”Handbook of Display Technology” by Joseph A. Castellano
